name: [CRYPTIC CASE]
description:
[CRYPTIC CASE] is a short narrative based horror game created by a single developer. This is my first complete game which I am very excited to share with you all. It underwent many changes throughout the course of its development and served as a great learning experience for me, even though there were plenty of things that I wanted to do but couldn't achieve. Thank you all for your support! 

Controls:

WASD - Basic movement 

Shift - Sprint

P - Menu

RMB - Flashlight

LMB - Interact

Note: 

Some effects will not work with low shadows enabled.

Update: 

-Changed the unlocking sound for doors that are unlocked with keycards.

-Adjusted the flashlight brightness.

-Made the final cutscene longer so that people could read the note.

-Fixed minor spelling error.
